kpi.name: M1002C14

kpi_info.title: RT DCH REQ FOR CS VOICE CALL REJECT IN DL IN SRNC
kpi_info.use: The total number of RT DCH requests for a CS Voice Call rejected in the SRNC for reasons caused by DL radio resources or capacity licensing. UPDATED: When an RT DCH request for a CS Voice Call (on SRNC side) is rejected for reasons caused by DL radio resources or capacity licensing. Whether the reject was caused by capacity licensing, can be checked from counter M1001C619.

kpi.kpi_alias: RT DCH REQ FOR CS VOICE CALL REJECT IN DL IN SRNC
